snippet: Chinese news media openly discuss the souring alliance and some see Kim Jong-un’s youth as a factor in the less familiar relations with China’s leaders.
abstract: North Korea's close relationship with China has faltered under leadership of Kim Jong-un, who is inexperienced and defiant; few in Chinese media describe rift as serious, though debate seems to be under way within Chinese government over how to handle Kim.
lead_paragraph: Chinese news media openly discuss the souring alliance and some see Kim Jong-un’s youth as a factor in the less familiar relations with China’s leaders.

headline.seo: Kim Jong-un Tests Relations With China
headline.main: North Korean Leader, Young and Defiant, Strains Ties With Chinese
headline.print_headline: North Korean Leader, Young and Defiant, Strains Ties With Chinese
